import React, {useContext, useState} from 'react' import {IoIosSearch} from "react-icons/io"; import {Context} from './Context' import {newarr} from './CategoriesBar' const Searchbar = () => { const {onSubmit, onClick} = useContext(Context) const [search, setSearch] = useState("") return (
setSearch(e.target.value)} placeholder="Search" />
) } export default Searchbar
